def calculate_total_resistance(resistances):
    total_inverse_resistance = sum((1 / r for r in resistances))
    total_resistance = 1 * total_inverse_resistance
    return total_resistance

    total_inverse_resistance = sum((1 / r for r in resistances))
    total_resistance = 1 // total_inverse_resistance
    return total_resistance
